film.title: Watch Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
film.summary: The new Apes movie is set many years after the conclusion of 2017 s War for the Planet of the Apes. Many apes societies have grown from when the Moses-like Caesar brought his people to an oasis, while humans have been reduced to a feral-like existence. Some ape groups have never heard of Caesar, while others have contorted his teaching to build burgeoning empires. In this setting, one ape leader begins to enslave other groups to find human technology, while another ape, who watched his clan be taken, embarks on a journey to find freedom. A young human woman becomes key to the latters quest, although she has plans of her own.

serial.title: My Happy Marriage
serial.summary: Misery seems everlasting in Miyo Saimoris life. Born from an arranged marriage, she was quickly discarded after her mothers tragic death. Her father remarried, and her younger half-sister Kaya received all the affection, while Miyo was degraded to a lowly servant. Lacking the strength to fight against her familys abuse, Miyo loses hope that her luck will ever turn. Unexpectedly, Miyos father summons her to deliver surprising news: she is to marry Kiyoka Kudou, the head of the distinguished Kudou family. Despite his noble background, Kiyoka is known to be a callous man who has thus far dismissed all of his former fiancées. Upon arriving at the Kudou household, Miyo expects coarse treatment and to be tossed aside. However, contrary to her assumptions, Kiyoka shows her the kindness and love that she has desperately needed. Marrying Kiyoka may be Miyos one chance to break free from her neglectful family and embrace a life of happiness.

serial.title: Solo Leveling
serial.summary: Humanity was caught at a precipice a decade ago when the first gates—portals linked with other dimensions that harbor monsters immune to conventional weaponry—emerged around the world. Alongside the appearance of the gates, various humans were transformed into hunters and bestowed superhuman abilities. Responsible for entering the gates and clearing the dungeons within, many hunters chose to form guilds to secure their livelihoods.Sung Jin-Woo is an E-rank hunter dubbed as the weakest hunter of all mankind. While exploring a supposedly safe dungeon, he and his party encounter an unusual tunnel leading to a deeper area. Enticed by the prospect of treasure, the group presses forward, only to be confronted with horrors beyond their imagination. Miraculously, Jin-Woo survives the incident and soon finds that he now has access to an interface visible only to him. This mysterious system promises him the power he has long dreamed of—but everything comes at a price.

serial.title: Classroom of the Elite
serial.summary: On the surface, Koudo Ikusei Senior High School is a utopia. The students enjoy an unparalleled amount of freedom, and it is ranked highly in Japan. However, the reality is less than ideal. Four classes, A through D, are ranked in order of merit, and only the top classes receive favorable treatment. Kiyotaka Ayanokouji is a student of Class D, where the school dumps its worst. There he meets the unsociable Suzune Horikita, who believes she was placed in Class D by mistake and desires to climb all the way to Class A, and the seemingly amicable class idol Kikyou Kushida, whose aim is to make as many friends as possible. While class membership is permanent, class rankings are not; students in lower ranked classes can rise in rankings if they score better than those in the top ones. Additionally, in Class D, there are no bars on what methods can be used to get ahead. In this cutthroat school, can they prevail against the odds and reach the top?

serial.title: The Eminence in Shadow
serial.summary: What did you want to be when you were a kid? A famous soccer player? A superhero? Or maybe a singer, gathering huge crowds at concerts? All this is not about our protagonist Sid, because he has always admired people from behind the scenes, those who almost do not take any action in the open, but appear only at the most crucial moment and, having done the job, disappears without a trace. In our world, it is difficult to pull off such a thing, because no matter what you do, you can't go against the atomic bomb. And so, thinking about ways to repel nuclear weapons with his bare hands, our hero comes to the conclusion that there is no way without magic. Conveniently it turned out, because soon after that the guy met the notorious truck, which sent him to the other world, or to be more precise, to the world full of swords, magic and other delights of fantasy universes. Now Sid will have no obstacles on his way to becoming the greatest ruler from the shadows. Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

serial.title: Chainsaw Man
serial.summary: Denji has to completely change his life to pay off his father's exorbitant debts. He becomes the Yakuza's handmaiden in the difficult business of destroying demons. Not only sleep and rest, but also communication with his beloved girl. Only the devil's pet-assistant Pochita brings a little variety in the succession of bloody everyday life. Now Denji has only one goal - money, only in them he sees a chance for release. Wanting to get a quick profit, the guy forgets about caution and dies in one of the fights. The faithful Pochito saves his master by merging with him and giving him the ability to partially transform into a chainsaw. Translated with DeepL.com (free version)

serial.title: Sword Art Online
serial.summary:
The beginning of the twenty-first century, the Japanese genius created a universe, the release of which was awaited by the entire world of "sword art". Gamers got the opportunity of complete immersion. The novelty became the most expected and ten thousand samples with lightning speed disappeared from the shelves. Everyone entered reality, dissolved into it and gathered in the City. The creator appeared. A huge black shadow explained to the participants that it was possible to return to the real world only by going through the whole game. But there is one cruel moment, virtual death means death in real life and it is impossible to pass it at random. After the loud words the creator vaporized, leaving the players alone.

The reaction to the message was different. Desperation set in, some teamed up with others, and some, like Kazuto's character, went it alone. Kirigaya is an orphan and so once in this world, he loses nothing. He is a beta tester and knowing everything about the game, he quickly gained popularity with the players. The hero realizes that without interaction with others he can not get out and has to establish contacts with other players. And while the swordfight is going on, everyone will see a lot of amazing things.

cartoon.title: Kimi no Na wa.
cartoon.summary:
The action in the anime Your Name will take place in two cities. The main characters are a couple of ordinary people who do not even suspect that soon fate will connect their lives very firmly. They have never been acquainted, she is a favorite daughter who devotes her free time to work in the temple. He is a reliable friend, successful and hard-working at work, has not bad tasks of a talented artist. Her life is calm and measured in a small provincial town, while he lives in a huge metropolis, full of turmoil and constant escapism.
Mitsuha Miyamizu and Taki Tachibana have never met each other, and yet one strange event binds them together. One day in a dream they switch bodies and it's unclear how to control this process. This begins to repeat more and more often, which will create a lot of problems in the lives of our heroes, because waking up every day in someone else's bed in someone else's house is not very pleasant. But what is the reason for such unusual metamorphosis? This is what the main characters will have to figure out.

cartoon.title: Koe no Katachi
cartoon.summary:
Everyone can make mistakes, but not everyone can realize it, then they feel shame. The plot of this anime tells the story of a boy Shoya Ishida and a girl Shoko Nishimiya. The girl has had hearing problems since childhood, and she had to suffer a lot because of it. The narrative starts at school, with their acquaintance, little Shoko is transferred to Shoya. She is initially disliked by most people, due to the fact that she was different from the others. He then makes the decision to ruin her life and bullies her.
The frequent bullying of young Shoko gets to a scary point, the guys just shamed her everywhere, made fun of her and made her cry all the time. One day, Shoya goes out of line, randomly, he hurts her right ear, after which the girl stops hearing them. She can no longer tolerate and moves to another city, the culprit begins a strong psychological disorder, feels a strong sense of guilt. And so in high school they meet. He realizes that this is a chance to correct the past between them.

cartoon.title: Nakitai Watashi wa Neko wo Kaburu
cartoon.summary: Miyo Sasaki, nicknamed "Muge", is an active and bright girl who is head over heels in love with her classmate Kento Hinode. Miyo's attempts to attract his attention fail, but the situation changes when she finds a magical mask that allows her to transform into "Taro", the cute white cat that Kento loves so much. The course of events seems tempting, but as time passes, the boundary between the girl and the cat begins to disappear.

cartoon.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen
cartoon.summary:
A full-length sequel to the anime series "Demon-Splitting Blade".
Tanjiro and his friends complete their recreational training at the Butterfly House and go on a new mission. Something fishy is going on on the Infinite Train: over 40 people disappear overnight! That means Tanjiro, Nezuko, Inosuke and Zenitsu will have to fight a powerful demon. Joining one of the strongest swordsmen - the flaming pillar Kyojuro Rengoku, the heroes challenge the enemy, while the train "Infinite" rushes into the valley of despair..

cartoon.title: Tenki no Ko
cartoon.summary: High school senior Hodaka Morishima leaves his remote island home and moves to Tokyo, where he immediately squanders all his money and begins to be poor until he finds a job at a dubious occult magazine. And just as he begins his new duties, the weather turns bad and it rains every day. One day on the streets of a crowded and bustling city, Hodaka meets a girl named Hina Amano. Due to some circumstances, Hina and her younger brother live alone, but have a fun and healthy life. She can stop the rain and disperse the clouds.

cartoon.title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0 Movie
cartoon.summary:
A boy, Yuta, and a girl, Rika, agree to get married when they come of age. Rika reinforces the seriousness of her intentions with a wedding ring, which she gives to Yuta. The boy accepts the gift, confirming his agreement to a future together. Soon Rika tragically dies under the wheels of a car in front of Yuta. The desperation of the dying girl gives birth to the strongest monster - a curse, which becomes an invisible guardian of Utah and cruelly punishes all his offenders.
A series of inexplicable emergencies attracts the attention of a magical association, which places Yuta under the supervision of Satoru Gojo, the strongest magician in Japan, who teaches at the Tokyo Magic School. Yuta makes new classmate friends, each with their own set of oddities and abilities. New knowledge about the structure of the magical world sparks hope that the boy will be able to dispel the curse of Ricky. But first he must survive a deadly battle with Suguru Gato, a high school graduate who has turned to the dark side.
The strongest evil magician intends to get Rika and with the help of her power to change the world order. All humans will be destroyed, and only the strongest mages who support Gato will gain power. Yuta, Satoru Gojo and other students do not agree with this and try to destroy the dark plan of the cruel magician with all their might.
